NavigatorWindowController Class Reference

Window Controller for the Navigator. The Navigator provides a unrolled view of the selected series (in 3D and in 4D). More...

Detailed Description

Window Controller for the Navigator. The Navigator provides a unrolled view of the selected series (in 3D and in 4D).

Member Function Documentation

Returns the Navigator Window Controller (which is a unique object).
